description: An HTML page serving as a front-end interface for browsing and visualizing database data, including styled elements, scripts for fetching and rendering database information, and user interaction handling.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets current selections, and updates the UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggle visibility of tables within a selected database and initiate loading of table list.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables within a selected database and displays them for selection.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from the selected table, rendering it into an interactive table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs and injects an HTML table based on the fetched data, handling wide content and layout.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling nulls, objects, and lengthy strings with expand/collapse functionality.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full data or truncate it for display.
